BlobsSystem

Class Brush

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlobsSystem.Brush
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleBrush, RectangleBrush

    public abstract class Brush
extends java.lang.Object
    A brush is a geometric form attached to a blob and which can interfere with others objects.

      abstract boolean intersect(Vector position, Vector blobPos)

    • Method Detail

      • intersect

        public abstract boolean intersect(Vector position,
                Vector blobPos)
        Determine whether the given position is in the current blob's position of this brush
        Parameters:
        position - Position of the given point
        blobPos - Current blob position
        Returns:
        true if the given point is in the Brush, false otherwise
